title: Bug 9872Change fast view contribution to keep track of associated view
description: Bug 9872Change fast view contribution to keep track of associated view The contributionitem could then reference the fast view which would help address bug 8645.
OB: build 20020214Currently, one ShowFastViewContribution adds all fastview toolbar items. per fast view.
EB: Thisshould be changed to match the perspective contribution item so that there isone contribution item (FastViewContribution?)
